messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] tapes from conference (was Re: Dealing with questioning grandparents)
messages.msgSnippet: The name comes first on the list and then the talks. There was only one video games talk.  If you order 02-26 that s what you ll get!
messages.messageBody:
The name comes first on the list and then the talks.
There was only one video games talk. If you order 02-26 that's what you'll
get!

messages.subject: tapes from conference (was Re: Dealing with questioning grandparents)
messages.msgSnippet: There are video game tapes mentioned three times.  There are: -q The Many Benefits of Video Games [02 26] Eve Dunaway -q The Many Benefits of Video Games [02
messages.messageBody:
There are video game tapes mentioned three times. There are:

-q The Many Benefits of Video Games [02 26]
Eve Dunaway

-q The Many Benefits of Video Games [02 26]
Kathy Ward

-q The Many Benefits of Video Games [02 26]
Tom & Debbie Weistar

-q The Many Benefits of Video Games, Sandra Dodd, Dan Vilter, Kathy
Ward [02
26]

Can you unconfuse me? <g> It looks like you did a talk with Dan
Vilter and Kathy Ward, but what did Eve Dunaway do? Or Tom and
Debbie Weistar?

Sheila

all

> Sheila >>
>
> No, the three people listed were co-speaking.
